snippet: Melinda Gomez’s son has a mental illness and her daughter has talked about killing herself. Both are now trying to go back to school and move past their struggles.
abstract: Family of mentally ill child Michael Gomez receive aid from Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens, one of the agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund; $350 from fund helped  pay for laptop for his eldest sister and $1,300 from federal Emergency Food and Shelter Program went towards what they owed in back rent.
